appDeprecated: This application has been deprecated. If you need access to it, please <support>contact support</support>.
appLoadingError: Unable to load App. Please try again later.
appParamsDeprecated: This application uses 1 or more parameters that have been deprecated. If you still need access to this application, please <support>contact support</support>.
errorResourceDoesNotExist: The selected file/folder does not exist.
helpMsgResourceRequirements: Resource Requirements may be adjusted so that the analysis is submitted with requests for larger minimum resources. Note that this may cause the analysis to wait longer in the submission queue until a node that matches those minimum requirements becomes available. So generally it is advisable to leave the resource requests set to the defaults that the tool or app integrator has set.
hpcAppWaitTimes:
This application runs on XSEDE, the U.S. National Supercomputing Network. Analyses run on this system enter a queue that includes many non-CyVerse users. Wait times for your analyses (jobs) to submit and run may be up to several days for large-memory applications. Please do not resubmit your analysis. If the status of your analysis has not changed from Submitted to Running after several days, contact support. To learn more about HPC apps, see Using HPC Apps in the DE.

Apply for your own XSEDE allocation to gain access to additional resources at XRAS - Submit Allocation Request. Access to this powerful system is made available to CyVerse users at no cost through a grant from the National Science Foundation.
jobLimitReachedPrompt:
You are running {{current}} of {{quota}} concurrent analyses.
Please Save and Complete, or Cancel, any currently running VICE analysis from Analyses view before launching a new VICE analysis. To request a permanent increase in your limit, please contact support.
launchOrSaveAsQL: Launch or Save as Quick Launch
launchForbiddenPrompt: This account is not permitted to launch VICE apps. If you believe you have encountered this message in error, please <support>contact support</support>.
multiInputEmptyLabel: Select the "Browse" button to add inputs.
name: Name
showAllParametersHelpText: Turn off to hide parameters without values entered or selected.
validationUnixGlob: Can not start with a slash ("/") and can not contain a parent directory pattern ("../")
